episodes.title: Universe People EXPLAINED: UFO Cult, Digital Paranoia & Cosmic Propaganda
episodes.description:
What happens when New Age spirituality, alien messiahs, and fear of technology collide? In this video, we explore the bizarre and unsettling story of the Universe People — one of the strangest UFO cults you've probably never heard of.

Led by Ivo A. Benda, this Czech-based movement claimed to receive telepathic transmissions from space beings, warned followers about digital IDs, barcodes, and vaccines, and promised salvation through galactic ascension.

🌌 From “Ashtar Sheran” to anti-modern conspiracy,
💻 From Cold War fear to 2000s-era internet chaos,
This is not just another alien story. This is a cult built on cosmic love... and dangerous paranoia.
